about_the_game:
Aggrolotls is an arena roguelite from top-down perspective where you are playing as tiny axolotls and have to evolve into a swarm that can take on powerful creatures from the sea. Level up and pick from Upgrades that make each round feel unique.

Killing enemies gives you experience, which you need to level up your swarm. As you defeat bosses, you will gain access to special upgrades that change the gameplay even more drastically. This allows you to discover different builds to overcome the challenges the sea has to offer.

This is the demo version of the full game and contains only a portion of what is available upon purchase. The full version contains an additional final boss, additional difficulty levels and unlockable upgrades between rounds.
